text: - Oh my god, these are so gorgeous.

Let me show you how you mix this.

and some gelatin, I'm stirring as I pour
so it dissolves properly.

Then you hit it with some
sweetened condensed milk.
You might want to use regular milk.

Don't do that because
that'll be nasty as hell.

Then we come behind there
with some coconut run, okay?

My favorite that right there,
that's our little base,
that's our little pina colada base.

You hit your cupcake pan
with some non-stick spray,
and then you pour.

You only want to go
about halfway up, okay?

Because remember, we're
layering this now, okay?

rest ain't going to fit.

Okay, now let's get on

So that's hot water and
this Island Pineapple Jello.

we gotta hit it with some rum.

Double down on the rum.

So we got coconut rum,
we got pineapple rum.
So what I'm doing here is
slicing off the bottom of some cherries.
